1. ```SQL 
BASE TABLE pedon.
 EXEC SQL SELECT DISTINCT taxonname
 FROM pedon
 INNER JOIN phorizon ON phorizon.peiidref=pedon.peiid
 AND (CAST(taxonname AS varbinary(20))) = CAST('baxter' AS varbinary(20));. 
 ```
